pullrequest.title: Use latest version of subt tunnel staging area

content.raw:
Using the catkin workspace, I can see that version 3 was now downloaded, but the inside of the tunnel entrance is still partially invisible \(see screenshot below\)

```
bencomo@bender:~/.ignition/fuel/fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/openrobotics/models/subt_tunnel_staging_area/3$ ls
materials  meshes  model.config  model.sdf  thumbnails
```

Tested with these launch configurations:

```
ign launch -v 4 tunnel_circuit_practice.ign robotName1:=X3 robotConfig1:=X3_SENSOR_CONFIG_3

ign launch -v 4 ~/subt_ws/src/subt/subt_ign/launch/tunnel_circuit_practice.ign robotName1:=X3 robotConfig1:=X3_SENSOR_CONFIG_4
```

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/2869401691-PR250.png)
content.html:

Tested with these launch configurations:
